name: Out of Oxygen (Kero-san)
description:
If you want to move on, make sure you have something to breathe.

You are a scientist who has crash landed on an unknown planet with no breathable atmosphere. You will have to explore the surroundings to find the four missing parts of your ship to leave. 
For this, you will use oxygen relays which not only allow you to breathe but also to appropriate the terrain. If you have none left, look for sparkling green crystals: Sylvanite. With those crystals you can have new relays and advance further. 

Survival advice: Don't stray too far away from the oxygen bubbles because in this peaceful world, your only enemy is asphyxiation.

NOTE:
The tileset came from the game The Messenger by Sabotage Studio.
The soundtrack is Forsaken Grotto from the game Starbound by Chucklefish.

I do not own nor claim to own the assets from The Messenger, the soundrack from Starbound or any copyrighted material here, and will take this game down if any of the copyright owners request that I do so.

If you're interested by The Messenger: https://themessengergame.com/
If you're interested by Starbound: https://playstarbound.com/
